data.title: Samuel Gilbert, born 13 Jan 1775, died 23 Oct 1850
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

Anna Goodspeed

Samuel Gilbert

Born: 13 Jan 1775, Hebron CT

Marriage: Anna Goodspeed on 18 Jan 1810

Died: 23 Oct 1850, Hebron CT

General notes:

Silversmith

Born deaf and dumb, as were his siblings.

Events in his life were:

He worked from circa 1798 to 1850 as a silversmith in Hebron New London CT

Hebron CT, 3 Dec 1850: the inventory of his estate was appraised by Henry H. Fitch and Elihu P. Buell. Listings include:

5 Silver Table Spoons 5.00

12 Silver Tea Spoons 4.00

Cream Spoon & Sugar Tongs 1.00

as well as goldsmith tools. 3

Samuel married Anna Goodspeed on 18 Jan 1810. (Anna Goodspeed was born on 8 Feb 1779 in East Haddam CT and died on 26 Nov 1851 in Hebron CT.)
